name: Cosmic Buns
description:
Become a Patron!

Controls
  • Left click to place a card.
  • Right click to discard a card.
Objective

Not even the Universe has enough Space for all these Bunnies!

Place cards next to each other, but make sure no two adjacent cards share a color nor a shape. Fill up the board to proceed to the next level!

You can discard up to 3 cards in a row by clicking the test tube, or by right-clicking. You can restart the current level by clicking the sad face button in the bottom right corner.
